task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

plannerResult.raw_task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

subtasks.name: agent-setup
subtasks.objective: Scaffold the frontend project foundation: configure build/runtime entrypoint, basic routing mount, and initial layout container for task management pages.

subtasks.name: agent-data
subtasks.objective: Define task domain model and local state/actions for CRUD flows (create, toggle complete, edit, delete) using in-memory/mock data.

subtasks.name: agent-components
subtasks.objective: Build reusable UI building blocks for the Tasks interface, including task item, task list, and task input form controls.

subtasks.name: agent-views
subtasks.objective: Assemble the page-level views and apply styling/theme: task dashboard layout, empty/loading states, and responsive visual polish.
